SELECT t.id, t.org_code AS orgCode, t.company_name AS companyName, t.ipo_plate AS ipoPlate, t.industry_csrc AS industryCsrc, (select t3.att_url from sa_company t2,sa_attachment t3 where t2.id = t3.business_id and t.org_code = t2.rela_code limit 1 ) companyLogoUrl FROM ipo_case t, case_common_status_info t1
WHERE ipo_plate = #{ipoPlate} AND t.id = t1.case_id AND t1.release_flag = '1' AND t.org_code != #{orgCode} ORDER BY
FIELD(industry_csrc,#{industryCsrc}) desc,
RAND() limit 4;

SELECT t.id, t.org_code AS orgCode, t.company_name AS companyName, t.ipo_plate AS ipoPlate, t.industry_csrc AS industryCsrc, (select t3.att_url from sa_company t2,sa_attachment t3 where t2.id = t3.business_id and t.org_code = t2.rela_code limit 1 ) companyLogoUrl FROM ipo_case t, case_common_status_info t1 WHERE ipo_plate = #{ipoPlate} AND t.id = t1.case_id AND t1.release_flag = '1' AND t.org_code != #{orgCode} ORDER BY RAND() limit 4;

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(m.id) FROM ipo_h5 m)AS ipoCompanyCount, (SELECT COUNT(m.id) FROM sa_company m WHERE m.belongs_plate = '02' AND m.ipo_flag = '1' AND m.liststate in ('0','1')) AS saCompanyCount, t.id AS id, t.bid AS bid, t.research AS research, t.research_ranking AS researchRanking, t.patent AS patent, (select sum(m.patent)from ipo_h5 m)AS patentAll, t.patent_new AS patentNew, (select sum(m.patent_new)from ipo_h5 m)AS patentNewAll, t.patent_design AS patentDesign, (select sum(m.patent_design)from ipo_h5 m)AS patentDesignAll, t.patent_internation AS patentInternation, (select sum(m.patent_internation)from ipo_h5 m)AS patentInternationAll, (ifnull(t.patent,0)+ifnull(t.patent_new,0)+ifnull(t.patent_design,0)+ifnull(t.patent_internation,0)) AS patentSum, (select sum(mt.patentSum) from (select (ifnull(m.patent,0)+ifnull(m.patent_new,0)+ifnull(m.patent_design,0)+ifnull(m.patent_internation,0)) AS patentSum from ipo_h5 m) as mt)AS patentSumAll, t.patent_ranking AS patentRanking, t.patent_ranking_year AS patentRankingYear, t.research_peo AS researchPeo, (SELECT SUM(m.research_peo) FROM ipo_h5 m)AS researchPeoAll, t.research_peo_core AS researchPeoCore, (SELECT SUM(m.research_peo_core) FROM ipo_h5 m)AS researchPeoCoreAll, t.company_peo AS companyPeo, (SELECT SUM(m.company_peo) FROM ipo_h5 m)AS companyPeoAll, t.research_peo_ranking AS researchPeoRanking, t.research_peo_year AS researchPeoYear, t.taking AS taking, t.taking_ranking AS takingRanking, t.taking_ranking_gem AS takingRankingGem, t.taking_ranking_year AS takingRankingYear, t.profits AS profits, t.profits_ranking AS profitsRanking, t.profits_ranking_gem AS profitsRankingGem, t.profits_ranking_year AS profitsRankingYear, t.assets AS assets, t.assets_ranking AS assetsRanking, t.assets_ranking_gem AS assetsRankingGem, t.assets_ranking_year AS assetsRankingYear, t.research_year AS researchYear, t.research_plate_fiavg AS researchPlateFiavg, t.research_plate_seavg AS researchPlateSeavg, t.research_plate_thavg AS researchPlateThavg, t.taking_fiavg AS takingFiavg, t.taking_seavg AS takingSeavg, t.taking_thavg AS takingThavg, t.industry_csrc AS industryCsrc, t.research_year_se AS researchYearSe, t.research_year_th AS researchYearTh FROM ipo_h5 t WHERE t.bid = #{bid}

SELECT t.id AS id,t.org_code AS orgCode,t.plate_type AS plateType,t.column_comment AS columnComment, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT 1 FROM ipo_h5_detail m WHERE m.column_comment = #{columnComment} AND m.plate_type = #{plateType} AND m.industry_csrc = #{industryCsrc} GROUP BY m.org_code)AS mt) AS orgCount, t.report_date AS reportDate,t.year AS year,ifnull((sum(t.curr_val)/(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT 1 FROM ipo_h5_detail m WHERE m.column_comment = #{columnComment} AND m.plate_type = #{plateType} AND m.industry_csrc = #{industryCsrc} GROUP BY m.org_code)AS mt)),"0") AS currValAvg,t.industry_csrc FROM ipo_h5_detail t WHERE t.column_comment = #{columnComment} AND t.plate_type = #{plateType} AND t.industry_csrc = #{industryCsrc} GROUP BY t.`year` ORDER BY t.`year` DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT t.industry_csrc AS industryCsrc FROM ipo_case t WHERE t.id = #{bid}

SELECT t.id, t.company_name companyName, t.company_zh_name title FROM ipo_case t,case_common_status_info t1 where ipo_plate = #{ipoPlate} AND t.id = t1.case_id and t1.release_flag = '1'
and (t.company_name like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%') or t.company_zh_name like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%'))

SELECT t.id, t.company_name companyName, t.company_zh_name title FROM ipo_case t,case_common_status_info t1 where ipo_plate = #{ipoPlate} AND t.id = t1.case_id and t1.release_flag = '1'
and t.id = #{id}

SELECT tb.*,(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(tb.processTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN '1' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(tb.processTime,'%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN '2' ELSE '0' END)AS makeNewStatus FROM(SELECT t.id, t.company_name companyName, t.company_zh_name title, (SELECT m.process_time FROM ipo_process m WHERE m.bid = t.id AND m.tree_type_code = '02' AND m.process_type_code = '16' ORDER BY m.pro_sort DESC LIMIT 1)AS processTime FROM ipo_case t,case_common_status_info t1 WHERE t.id = t1.case_id and t1.release_flag = '1' and t.ipo_plate = '069001001006' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ipo_process m WHERE m.bid = t.id AND m.tree_type_code = '01' AND m.process_type_code = '38' AND m.iec_result = '07'))AS tb

SELECT tb.*,(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(tb.processTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN '1' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(tb.processTime,'%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN '2' ELSE '0' END)AS makeNewStatus FROM(SELECT t.id, t.company_name companyName, t.company_zh_name title, (SELECT m.process_time FROM ipo_process m WHERE m.bid = t.id AND m.tree_type_code = '02' AND m.process_type_code = '16' ORDER BY m.pro_sort DESC LIMIT 1)AS processTime FROM ipo_case t,case_common_status_info t1 WHERE t.id = t1.case_id and t1.release_flag = '1' and t.ipo_plate = '069001002002' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ipo_process m WHERE m.bid = t.id AND m.tree_type_code = '01' AND ((m.process_type_code = '35' AND m.iec_result = '05') or (m.process_type_code = '07' AND m.iec_result ='00')))AS tb

SELECT t.org_code,t.business_volume,t.passing,t.passing_wait,t.intermediary_type,t.org_year orgYear, (SELECT (COUNT(1)+1) FROM (SELECT * FROM ipo_h5_org m GROUP BY m.intermediary_type,m.business_volume)AS mt WHERE (mt.business_volume+0) > (t.business_volume+0) AND mt.intermediary_type = t.intermediary_type)AS businessVolumeRank, (SELECT (COUNT(1)+1) FROM (SELECT * FROM ipo_h5_org m GROUP BY m.intermediary_type,m.passing)AS mt WHERE ifnull((mt.passing+0),0) > ifnull((t.passing+0),0) AND mt.intermediary_type = t.intermediary_type)AS passingRank FROM ipo_h5_org t WHERE t.org_code = #{orgCode} AND t.intermediary_type = #{intermediaryType} and t.ipo_plate = #{ipoPlate}

SELECT a.*, -- 专利情况排名 patentRanking (SELECT count(bsum) FROM (SELECT IFNULL(t3.domestic_invention,0)+IFNULL(t3.domestic_newtype,0)+IFNULL(t3.domestic_design,0)+IFNULL(t3.foreign_patent,0) AS bsum FROM ipo_case t1, case_common_status_info t2, ipo_technology AS t3 WHERE t2.case_id = t1.id AND t2.release_flag = 1 AND t1.ipo_plate = #{ipoPlate} AND t3.bid = t1.id) AS b WHERE a.patentSum < b.bsum)+1 AS patentRanking , c.* FROM ( SELECT t1.id, -- 专利情况 t3.domestic_invention AS patent, -- 使用新型专利 t3.domestic_newtype AS patentNew, -- 外观设计专利 t3.domestic_design AS patentDesign, -- 国际专利 t3.foreign_patent AS patentInternation, -- 专利总数 IFNULL(t3.domestic_invention,0)+IFNULL(t3.domestic_newtype,0)+IFNULL(t3.domestic_design,0)+IFNULL(t3.foreign_patent,0) AS patentSum FROM ipo_case t1, case_common_status_info t2, ipo_technology AS t3 WHERE t2.case_id = t1.id AND t2.release_flag = 1 AND t1.ipo_plate = #{ipoPlate} AND t1.id = #{id} AND t3.bid = t1.id) AS a, (SELECT -- 所有公司专利总数 SUM(IFNULL(t3.domestic_invention,0)+IFNULL(t3.domestic_newtype,0)+IFNULL(t3.domestic_design,0)+IFNULL(t3.foreign_patent,0)) AS patentSumAll, -- 发明专利总数 SUM(t3.domestic_invention) AS patentAll, -- 使用新型专利总数 SUM(t3.domestic_newtype) AS patentNewAll, -- 外观设计专利总数 SUM(t3.domestic_design) AS patentDesignAll, -- 国际专利总数 SUM(t3.foreign_patent) AS patentInternationAll, -- ipo库中科创板公司总数 count(*) AS ipoCompanyCount FROM ipo_case t1, case_common_status_info t2, ipo_technology AS t3 WHERE t2.case_id = t1.id AND t2.release_flag = 1 AND t1.ipo_plate = #{ipoPlate} AND t3.bid = t1.id) AS c
